original_title: Ice Nine Kills: The Silver Stream
overview: Horror-themed, metalcore pioneers Ice Nine Kills present an interactive horror experience "The Silver Stream." Join the band and official host cult horror icon Bill Moseley as they take fans on a journey through the bowels of hell for this unprecedented interactive experience that will feature the concert footage of their 19-track set, shot with an 8 camera set up at their sold out hometown show at The Worcester Palladium and a bespoke, built-in horror movie created by Spencer Charnas and Director Myles Erfurth of Stained Glass Eye Ent.
tagline: If you're online to chat, you're in line to die!
title: Ice Nine Kills: The Silver Stream
